WorkItem.Description: I can find very little in the way of help to learn how to do this. I have a program that needs to be able to download and view/use data which is provided in the JSON format. Please give a example in VB.NET showing how to get this data into some .NET classes and become usable to me.
WorkItem.Summary: Deserialize JSON data from web service into .NET class structure

Comments.Message: C# example would be nice too

Thank you for using our free Microsoft All-In-One Code Framework Sample Request Service!

We found some samples about it, and you can refer the following links:
